body:
I typed avicus.net/staff into my browser and this came up. Just thought I should notify y'all.

EDIT: reported to highstaff via support page as suggested.
body_tagged:

title: Forum issue?

replies.body:
It's the mapdev rank having problems, it didn't happen until our ranks were pulled and my guess is that once it ran out of people to display under the column of "Map Developers", it couldn't just be there and say 0 so it went into 500 mode where it's broken.

The Web server (running the Web Site) encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

replies.body:
Para is correct, this is a result of the map dev rank being empty.

I've given Ivy map dev to keep the page up until he fixes it.
